subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets, who were swept by the Padres in a four-game series last June, lost for the sixth time in eight games and dropped to a season-high 11 games behind the Phillies in the N.L. East.
snippet: The Mets, who were swept by the Padres in a four-game series last June, lost for the sixth time in eight games and dropped to a season-high 11 games behind the Phillies in the N.L. East.
